test.name: Get request and validate response code and body

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mySession, url=https://www.metaweather.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Response : url=https://www.metaweather.com/api/location/search/?query=Helsinki status=200, reason=OK headers={'x-xss-protection': '1; mode=block', 'Content-Language': 'en', 'x-content-type-options': 'nosniff', 'strict-transport-security': 'max-age=2592000; includeSubDomains', 'Vary': 'Accept-Language, Cookie', 'Allow': 'GET, HEAD, OPTIONS', 'x-frame-options': 'DENY', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-Cloud-Trace-Context': '5739f0a45a96faa2c4cb9ce270c946b6', 'Date': 'Tue, 05 Apr 2022 07:39:38 GMT', 'Server': 'Google Frontend', 'Content-Length': '94'} body=[{"title":"Helsinki","location_type":"City","woeid":565346,"latt_long":"60.171162,24.932581"}]

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

test.doc: This test case verifies response code of GET request is 200 response body contains the title key with value "Helsinki" and response body contains the key "location_type"
